trans-unit.source: Customizes the behavior of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref> object with which the adapter is associated for specific browser requests.
trans-unit.target: Personaliza o comportamento de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"> </xref> objeto ao qual o adaptador está associado para solicitações de navegador específico.

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class is bound to a data source and generates its user interface or child control hierarchy by enumerating the items in the data source to which it is bound.
trans-unit.target: Derivado de um controle de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>classe está associada a uma fonte de dados e gera sua hierarquia de controle de filho ou de interface do usuário, enumerando os itens na fonte de dados ao qual ele está vinculado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> is an abstract base class that defines the common characteristics of all controls that can be bound to a data source, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>é uma classe base abstrata que define as características de todos os controles que podem ser associados a uma fonte de dados, como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: A DataBoundControlAdapter modifies the behavior of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> for a specific browser or class of browsers, or acts as a filter on some capability.
trans-unit.target: Um DataBoundControlAdapter modifica o comportamento de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>para uma classe de navegadores ou atua como um filtro em algum recurso ou um navegador específico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: Grande parte da capacidade de adaptação no comportamento de renderização pode ser encapsulado nas classes especializadas que derivam da <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> de

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is likely that a single adapter can be used for a number of browser class behaviors or that inclusion of the adaptability in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> classes can make the use of a control adapter unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, é provável que um único adaptador pode ser usado para um número de comportamentos de classe do navegador ou que inclusão de capacidade de adaptação no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>classes podem fazer o uso de um adaptador de controle desnecessária.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Each control has explicit mappings to adapters through the .browser definition files, if there are `<controlAdapter>` entries in these files.
trans-unit.target: Cada controle tem mapeamentos explícitos para adaptadores através dos arquivos de definição. browser, se houver `<controlAdapter>` as entradas nesses arquivos.

trans-unit.source: Thus, any access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> object extracted from the .browser definition files to perform the lookup for the mapping of the adapter to control.
trans-unit.target: Assim, qualquer acesso ao <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>usa o <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>objeto extraído dos arquivos de definição. browser para executar a pesquisa para o mapeamento do adaptador de controle.</xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>

trans-unit.source: During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the methods of a control that could be browser specific.
trans-unit.target: Durante o processamento, o .NET Framework intercepta chamadas para os métodos de um controle que pode ser específico do navegador.

trans-unit.source: If a control adapter is attached, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver conectado a um adaptador de controle, o .NET Framework chama os métodos de adaptador associado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.PerformDataBinding(System.Collections.IEnumerable) method binds an enumerable collection to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: O método M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.PerformDataBinding(System.Collections.IEnumerable) associa uma coleção enumerável associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.Control%2A> property returns a strongly typed reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.Control%2A>propriedade retorna uma referência com rigidez de tipos para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> class when it creates the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> object.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>classe quando ele cria correspondente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a strongly-typed reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref> object associated with this control adapter.
trans-unit.target: Recupera uma referência fortemente tipados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"> </xref> objeto associado a este adaptador de controle.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> object is attached to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> control, the .NET Framework calls certain adapter members instead of the control members.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>objeto está anexado a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>controle, o .NET Framework chama determinados membros adaptador em vez dos membros de controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref> to which this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter"></xref> is attached.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"> </xref> ao qual este <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter"> </xref> está anexado.

trans-unit.source: Binds the data in the data source of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref> object to the control adapter.
trans-unit.target: Associa os dados na fonte de dados de associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"> </xref> objeto para o adaptador de controle.

trans-unit.source: The PerformDataBinding method is called in place of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> control adapter is attached to a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O método PerformDataBinding é chamado em vez do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>adaptador de controle está anexado a um controle derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, an override of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> iterates through data, creating distinct names and values when necessary, and saves it to an internal collection.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, uma substituição de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>itera por meio de dados, criando nomes distintos e valores quando necessário e o salva em uma coleção interna.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Usually, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A> or a similar method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> will populate the user interface or child controls from that internal collection.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A>ou um método semelhante a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>preencherá os controles de filho ou de interface do usuário da coleção interna.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> of <xref:System.Object> to be bound to the derived <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>de <xref:System.Object>a ser associado ao derivada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>
